events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but it still hasn’t arrived, and the tracking shows no updates.
The issue is categorized under Delivery Delay based on customer's description of a late shipment with no tracking updates.
The case has been assigned to delivery support specialist Michael to handle the delay complaint.
Hello, I’m Michael from customer support. I’m here to assist with your delayed shipment issue and will do my best to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can look into the tracking details for you?
Sure, the order number is 782345, and the shipping address is 123 Maple Street, Springfield.
I checked the tracking info and saw a delay due to weather conditions. We can offer expedited shipping at no extra cost to get your package to you faster.
Thank you, I appreciate the offer of expedited shipping to help speed up delivery given the circumstances.
We have upgraded your shipment to expedited delivery. You should receive your order within 2-3 business days now.
Just following up to confirm that your expedited shipment has arrived and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
As we received confirmation that your order was delivered successfully, the case will now be closed. Thank you for contacting us.
